body:
Release Notes

Enhancements

Accessibility
  • Now, you can copy an existing Accessibility analysis on the Manage Accessibility Analyses page by selecting the edit option in the action ellipse (vertical three dots) for the analysis you want to copy.
    • The copy will be automatically named “Copy of ”.
    • If you make multiple copies of the same analysis, the subsequent copies will be numbered, e.g. “Copy of (1)”.
    • The copies will have a “Suspended” status to allow you to edit the criteria as you need and then perform the analysis.
      • However, copies of incomplete analyses will have an incomplete status.
Adequacy
  • Now, you can copy an existing Adequacy analysis on the Manage Adequacy Analyses page by selecting the edit option in the action ellipse (vertical three dots) for the analysis you want to copy.
    • The copy will be automatically named “Copy of ”.
    • If you make multiple copies of the same analysis, the subsequent copies will be numbered, e.g. “Copy of (1)”.
    • The copies will have a “Suspended” status to allow you to edit the criteria as you need and then perform the analysis.
      • However, copies of incomplete analyses will have an incomplete status.
Specifications
  • Now, you can copy an existing Specification on the Manage Specifications page using the copy icon.
    • The copy will be automatically named “Copy of ”.
    • If you make multiple copies of the same specification, the subsequent copies will be numbered, e.g. “Copy of (1)”.
